Interface CardCollection

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerBoard
public interface CardCollection
Represents a general interface for any collection of cards in the game, such as a hand, board, or deck. Supports adding and removing cards.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCard(Card card)
    Adds a single card to the collection.
    void
    addCards(ArrayList<Card> cards)
    Adds a list of cards to the collection.
    void
    removeCard(Card card)
    Removes the specified card from the collection.

  • Method Details

    • addCards

      void addCards(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      Adds a list of cards to the collection.
      Parameters:
      cards - the list of cards to add

    • addCard

      void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a single card to the collection.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add

    • removeCard

      void removeCard(Card card) throws InvalidCardException
      Removes the specified card from the collection.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to remove
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - if the card is not found or cannot be removed
